## FlatTileBoundingBoxGenerator class

`FlatTileBoundingBoxGenerator` generates bounding boxes in world and geo coordinates for a given TilingScheme.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class FlatTileBoundingBoxGenerator 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(tilingScheme, minElevation, maxElevation)](./harp-geoutils.flattileboundingboxgenerator._constructor_.md) |  | Creates a new <code>FlatTileBoundingBoxGenerator</code> that can generate bounding boxes for the given TilingScheme. |

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [maxElevation](./harp-geoutils.flattileboundingboxgenerator.maxelevation.md) |  | number |  |
|  [minElevation](./harp-geoutils.flattileboundingboxgenerator.minelevation.md) |  | number |  |
|  [projection](./harp-geoutils.flattileboundingboxgenerator.projection.md) |  | [Projection](./harp-geoutils.projection.md) | Returns the \[\[Projection\]\] of the \[\[TilingScheme\]\]. |
|  [subdivisionScheme](./harp-geoutils.flattileboundingboxgenerator.subdivisionscheme.md) |  | [SubdivisionScheme](./harp-geoutils.subdivisionscheme.md) | Returns the \[\[SubdivisionScheme\]\] of the \[\[TilingScheme\]\]. |
|  [tilingScheme](./harp-geoutils.flattileboundingboxgenerator.tilingscheme.md) |  | [TilingScheme](./harp-geoutils.tilingscheme.md) |  |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getGeoBox(tileKey)](./harp-geoutils.flattileboundingboxgenerator.getgeobox.md) |  | Returns the bounding box in geo coordinates for the given \[\[TileKey\]\].<!-- -->Example:
```typescript
const geoBox = generator.getGeoBox(worldBounds);
console.log(geoBox.center);

```
 |
|  [getWorldBox(tileKey, result)](./harp-geoutils.flattileboundingboxgenerator.getworldbox.md) |  | Returns the bounding box in world coordinates of the given \[\[TileKey\]\].<!-- -->Example:
```typescript
const worldBounds = new THREE.Box3();
generator.getWorldBox(geoBox, worldBounds);
console.log(worldBounds.getCenter());

```
 |
